revision.text:
{{Infobox film | name = Shoshurbari Zindabad 2 | image = | image_size = | director = Debasish Biswas | producer = Bengal Multimedia Limited | starring = {{ubl|[[Bappy Chowdhury]]|[[Apu Biswas]] }} | story = Abdullah Zahir Babu | screenplay = Debasish Biswas | music = {{ubl|[[Emon Saha]]|[[Shree Pritam]]|[[Akassh]]}} | country = [[Bangladesh]] | language = Bengali | studio = Bengal Multimedia Limited }} '''''Shoshurbari Zindabad 2''''' is an upcoming Bangladeshi romantic-drama film. The film screenplay, dialogue and directed by Debasish Biswas and produced by Bengal Multimedia Limite. It feature [[Bappy Chowdhury]] and [[Apu Biswas]] in the lead roles and [[Sadek Bachchu]], [[Kabila (actor)|Kabila]] and [[Harun Kisinger]] played supporting roles in the film.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.banglanews24.com/entertainment/news/bd/734416.details|title=দুর্গাপূজায় মুক্তি পাবে ‘শ্বশুরবাড়ি জিন্দাবাদ ২’|last=|first=|date=|website=বাংলা নিউজ টোয়েন্টিফোর|language=bn|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=22 January 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://m.rtvonline.com/entertainment/59640/শেষের-পথে-বাপ্পী-অপুর-শ্বশুরবাড়ি--জিন্দাবাদ-২|title=শেষের পথে বাপ্পী-অপুর শ্বশুরবাড়ী জিন্দাবাদ ২|last=|first=|date=|website=আরটিভি অনলাইন|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=22 January 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.bd-pratidin.com/entertainment/2019/01/13/391614|title=শ্বশুরবাড়ি জিন্দাবাদ-২ ছবিতে অপু-বাপ্পীর রসায়ন {{!}} বাংলাদেশ প্রতিদিন|last=|first=|date=|website=বাংলাদেশ প্রতিদিন|language=bn|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=22 January 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.ntvbd.com/entertainment/%E0%A6%85%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%81%E0%A6%95%E0%A7%87-%E0%A6%B8%E0%A6%99%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%97%E0%A7%87-%E0%A6%A8%E0%A6%BF%E0%A7%9F%E0%A7%87-%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%B0%E0%A6%B8%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%A4%E0%A7%81%E0%A6%A4-%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%80-688169|title=অপুকে সঙ্গে নিয়ে প্রস্তুত বাপ্পী|last=|first=|date=16 January 2020|website=এনটিভি অনলাইন|language=bn|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=22 January 2020}}</ref>
== Cast == * [[Bappy Chowdhury]] as Abir<ref name=":0">{{cite web|url=https://www.ittefaq.com.bd/print-edition/entertainment/91530/শেষ-হলো-শ্বশুরবাড়ি-জিন্দাবাদ-২|title=শেষ হলো শ্বশুরবাড়ি জিন্দাবাদ ২! {{!}} বিনোদন প্রতিদিন|website=ittefaq|access-date=2020-01-22}}</ref> * [[Apu Biswas]] as Ishana<ref name=":0" /> * [[Sadek Bachchu]] * [[Kabila (actor)|Kabila]] * [[Harun Kisinger]] * [[Rebeka Rouf]] * [[Afzal Sharif]] * [[Chikon Ali]] * Borda Mithu
== Production == On May 13, 2018, the Muharat of the film was helded at Priyanka Shooting Spot in Dhaka.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.ekushey-tv.com/শ্বশুরবাড়ি-জিন্দাবাদ-২-সিনেমার-যাত্রা-শুরু/35943|title=শ্বশুরবাড়ি জিন্দাবাদ ২ সিনেমার যাত্রা শুরু|last=|first=|date=14 May 2018|website=একুশে টিভি অনলাইন|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=22 January 2020}}</ref>
=== Cast === [[Bappy Chowdhury]] and [[Apu Biswas]] contract sign for lead roles of the film on February 8, 2018.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.prothomalo.com/entertainment/article/1429096/%E2%80%98%E0%A6%B6%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%B6%E0%A7%81%E0%A6%B0%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%BE%E0%A7%9C%E0%A6%BF-%E0%A6%9C%E0%A6%BF%E0%A6%A8%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%A6%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%A6-%E0%A7%A8%E2%80%99-%E0%A6%9B%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%BF%E0%A6%A4%E0%A7%87-%E0%A6%85%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%81-%E0%A6%93-%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%80|title=‘শ্বশুরবাড়ি জিন্দাবাদ ২’ ছবিতে অপু ও বাপ্পী|last=|first=|date=11 February 2018|website=Prothom Alo|language=bn|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=22 January 2020}}</ref>
== Soundtrack == The film soundtrack composed by [[Emon Saha]], [[Shree Pritam]] and [[Akassh]].
== Marketing and release == The film got an uncut certificate from the censor board of Bangladesh on January 14, 2020.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.m.mzamin.com/article.php?mzamin=208565|title=ছাড়পত্র পেলো ‘শ্বশুরবাড়ি জিন্দাবাদ-২’|last=|first=|date=|website=মানবজমিন|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=2020-01-22}}</ref>
